name: @tharwah/chat-widget
description: Embeddable AI chatbot widget with analytics tracking for any website

scripts.test: node -c dist/TharwahChat-V1.js && node -c dist/TharwahTracker-V2.js && echo All source files validated successfully!
scripts.minify: terser dist/TharwahChat-V1.js -o dist/TharwahChat-V1.min.js -c -m && terser dist/TharwahTracker-V2.js -o dist/TharwahTracker-V2.min.js -c -m
scripts.build: npm test && npm run minify && echo Build complete! Minified files ready for production.

author: Tharwah
